text: Theodore Lee "Ted" Goulait (August 12, 1889 - July 15, 1936) was an American baseball pitcher. He played one Major League Baseball match for the New York Giants in September 1912. He also played for many other teams in minor league competitions such as the Marion Diggers, the Springfield Reapers, the Toronto Maple Leafs, the Wilkes-Barre Barons and the Memphis Chicks. He was born in St. Clair, Michigan. Goulait died on July 15, 1936 in his hometown of St. Clair. He was 46. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1889 births Category:1936 deaths Category:American baseball players Category:New York Giants players Category:Sportspeople from Michigan
title: Ted Goulait
